hints.content:
The denominator in $\dfrac{3}{4}$ is $4$. 

So, there should be $4$ equal parts in each whole.




[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, three unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled 1, and two unlabeled tick marks. Four equal rectangles labeled one-fourth are above the number line between the tick mark at 0 and the tick mark at 1. Each rectangle represents one-fourth of a whole. !

hints.content:
The numerator in $\dfrac{3}{4}$ is $3$. 

So, we need to move $\dfrac14$ on the number line $\blueD3$ times to reach the point.



[[☃ image 1]]

Which number line shows a point located at $\dfrac{3}{4}$?

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, two unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled three-fourths, a tick mark labeled 1, and two unlabeled tick marks. Four equal rectangles labeled one-fourth are above the number line between the tick mark at 0 and the tick mark at 1. Each rectangle represents one-fourth of a whole. The first three rectangles from the left are shaded. An arrow points to the right along the number line from the tick mark at 0 to the tick mark at three-fourths. !

hints.content:
Number line $\blueD{C}$ shows a point located is at $\dfrac34.$



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, three unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled 1, and two unlabeled tick marks. There is a blue dot at the third tick mark after the 0. !

question.content:
**Which point is at $\dfrac{3}{​4}$ on the number line?**
 
[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: $\greenD{A}$ ![ A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, one unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled 1, and an unlabeled ending tick mark. There is a green dot at the ending tick mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/45acf41a73237017982d57ba8f0ed5949d8abb0b)

$\maroonD{B}$ ![A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, three unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled 1, and two unlabeled tick marks. There is a pink dot at the 1 tick mark. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8d26d16607c5826b61029e2e209872952e5e3dd2)

$\blueD{C}$ ![A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, three unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled 1, and two unlabeled tick marks. There is a blue dot at the third tick mark after the 0.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/595212903b0e3cb7fb00ab6d4c9f144d30ae479f)
